00022 enum TLogLevel {logERROR, logWARNING, logINFO, logDEBUG, logDEBUG1, logDEBUG2, logDEBUG3, logDEBUG4};
00023 
00024 class Log
00025 {
00026 public:
00027     Log();
00028     virtual ~Log();
00029     std::ostringstream& Get(TLogLevel level = logINFO);
00030 public:
00031     static TLogLevel& ReportingLevel();
00032     static std::string ToString(TLogLevel level);
00033     static TLogLevel FromString(const std::string& level);
00034 protected:
00035     std::ostringstream os;
00036 private:
00037     Log(const Log&);
00038     Log& operator =(const Log&);
00039 };

00041 inline Log::Log()
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 inline std::ostringstream& Log::Get(TLogLevel level)
00046 {
00047     os << "- " << NowTime();
00048     os << " " << ToString(level) << ": ";
00049     os << std::string(level > logDEBUG ? level - logDEBUG : 0, '\t');
00050     return os;
00051 }
00052 
00053 inline Log::~Log()
00054 {
00055     os << std::endl;
00056     fprintf(stderr, "%s", os.str().c_str());
00057     fflush(stderr);
00058 }
00059 
00060 inline TLogLevel& Log::ReportingLevel()
00061 {
00062     static TLogLevel reportingLevel = logDEBUG4;
00063     return reportingLevel;
00064 }
00065 
00066 inline std::string Log::ToString(TLogLevel level)
00067 {
00068         static const char* const buffer[] = {"ERROR", "WARNING", "INFO", "DEBUG", "DEBUG1", "DEBUG2", "DEBUG3", "DEBUG4"};
00069     return buffer[level];
00070 }
00071 
00072 inline TLogLevel Log::FromString(const std::string& level)
00073 {
00074     if (level == "DEBUG4")
00075         return logDEBUG4;
00076     if (level == "DEBUG3")
00077         return logDEBUG3;
00078     if (level == "DEBUG2")
00079         return logDEBUG2;
00080     if (level == "DEBUG1")
00081         return logDEBUG1;
00082     if (level == "DEBUG")
00083         return logDEBUG;
00084     if (level == "INFO")
00085         return logINFO;
00086     if (level == "WARNING")
00087         return logWARNING;
00088     if (level == "ERROR")
00089         return logERROR;
00090     Log().Get(logWARNING) << "Unknown logging level '" << level << "'. Using INFO level as default.";
00091     return logINFO;
00092 }

00094 typedef Log FILELog;
00095 
00096 #define FILE_LOG(level) \
00097     if (level > FILELog::ReportingLevel()) ; \
00098     else Log().Get(level)

00104 inline std::string NowTime()
00105 {
00106     const int MAX_LEN = 200;
00107     char buffer[MAX_LEN];
00108     if (GetTimeFormatA(LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT, 0, 0,
00109             "HH':'mm':'ss", buffer, MAX_LEN) == 0)
00110         return "Error in NowTime()";
00111 
00112     char result[100] = {0};
00113     static DWORD first = GetTickCount();
00114     std::sprintf(result, "%s.%03ld", buffer, (long)(GetTickCount() - first) % 1000);
00115     return result;
00116 }
00117 
00118 #else
00119 
00120 #include <sys/time.h>
00121 
00122 inline std::string NowTime()
00123 {
00124     char buffer[11];
00125     time_t t;
00126     time(&t);
00127     tm r = {0};
00128     strftime(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "%X", localtime_r(&t, &r));
00129     struct timeval tv;
00130     gettimeofday(&tv, 0);
00131     char result[100] = {0};
00132     std::sprintf(result, "%s.%03ld", buffer, (long)tv.tv_usec / 1000);
00133     return result;
00134 }

00136 #endif //WIN32
